source: Title: Eccles Cakes, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons butter 1/4 pound currants 1 ounce candied orange peel diced 1/4 cup light brown sugar 1 lemon zested 1/2 teaspoon ground allspice 1/2 pound frozen puff pastry thawed 1 egg white lightly beaten granulated sugar for dusting, Steps: Preheat the oven to 425°F. Grease a baking sheet. Melt the butter, remove from the heat and mix in the currants, candied orange peel, sugar, lemon zest and allspice. On a lightly floured work surface, roll out the puff pastry and cut out 8 x 4 inch discs. Distribute the filling between the center of each disc. Brush the edges with egg white and seal. Turn over and lightly roll with a rolling pin. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Brush the tops with egg white and sprinkle with sugar. Make 3 slits in the top of each cake then bake for 15 mins, until golden. Allow to cool on a wire rack. Serve warm or cold. Will keep for 1 week in a sealed container.
references: Title: 葡萄干蛋糕, Ingredients: 2汤匙黄油 1/4 磅葡萄干 1 盎司 蜜饯橙皮丁 1/4 杯淡红糖 1 个柠檬皮 1/2 茶匙多香果粉 1/2 磅冷冻酥皮解冻 1个起泡蛋清 白砂糖, Steps: 1. 将烤箱预热至 425度。在烤盘上涂上油。黄油融化后，关火，加入醋栗、蜜饯橙皮、糖、柠檬皮屑和五香粉。 2. 在撒了面粉的台面上，擀出酥皮并切出 8 x 4 英寸的圆盘。在每个圆盘的中心之间加入填充物。用蛋清刷边缘并密封。翻过来，用擀面杖轻轻擀一下。 3. 放在准备好的烤盘上。在顶部刷上蛋清并撒上糖。在每个蛋糕的顶部切出 3 个切口，然后烘烤 15 分钟，直至呈金黄色。让其在金属丝架上冷却至温热或放冷。将在密封容器中保存 1 周。

Then add flour. After beating batter good, pur batter into pan with nuts and fruit and mix well. Line pan with brown paper sack or wax paper. Just line the bottom of the pan. Grease paper with oil. Bake 1 1/2 to 2 hours at 250 degrees. My cakes took 4 hours. Check cakes after 1 1/2 hours to see if cakes are light brown. Cakes should bake until darker. When cakes are done cool on rack in pan. references: Title: 水果蛋糕, Ingredients: 1磅糖渍樱桃（绿色或红色） 1磅蜜饯菠萝 14磅香橼（我使用8盎司混合水果） 12盎司巴西坚果（将每个完整的坚果切成5片）。 2磅山核桃 2盒（15盎司）葡萄干（1个金色和1个深色，我都用金色的）。 12磅枣，切开 2杯黄油，在室温下 3 12杯糖 10个大鸡蛋或12个鸡蛋，如果鸡蛋小的话，室温下。 1杯葡萄酒（摩根大卫黑莓皇家葡萄酒） 4杯低筋面粉（用以下香料筛出的面粉------）。 , Steps: 将水果和坚果切碎。 在1杯酒中浸泡过夜，或将坚果磨成面粉，放置过夜。 我把水果浸泡在酒里。 制作蛋糕糊--奶油黄油和糖。 然后每次加入一个鸡蛋，直到加入所有鸡蛋。 然后加入面粉。 打好面糊后，将面糊与坚果和水果一起倒入平底锅中，搅拌均匀。 用牛皮纸袋或蜡纸在平底锅上铺上一层。 只需在平底锅内铺设。 用油在纸上涂抹。 在250度下烘烤1.5至2小时。 我的蛋糕花了4个小时。 1个半小时后检查蛋糕，看蛋糕是否呈浅棕色。 蛋糕应该烘烤到较深。 蛋糕烤好后放在锅里的架子上冷却。 蛋糕冷却后，用刀在边上松开。 用葡萄酒浸泡奶酪布，放在蛋糕上。 将蛋糕包起来，存放在阴凉处。 蛋糕应浸泡3或4次。

Title: 水果蛋糕

材料：
1. 500克蜜饯樱桃（红色或绿色）
2. 500克蜜饯菠萝
3. 225克蜜饯柑橘（可用8盎司混合水果代替）
4. 340克巴西坚果（每个坚果切成5片）
5. 1公斤山核桃
6. 2盒（15盎司）葡萄干（1盒金色和1盒深色，我用两盒金色）
7. 5.5公斤椰枣，切碎
8. 2杯黄油，室温
9. 3.5杯糖
10. 10个大鸡蛋或12个小鸡蛋，室温
11. 1杯葡萄酒（Morgan David黑莓皇家）
12. 4杯通用面粉（与以下香料一起筛选）
13. 1.5茶匙肉桂
14. 1.5茶匙五香粉
15. 1茶匙肉豆蔻
16. 1茶匙丁香
17. 1.5茶匙发酵粉
18. 1.25茶匙盐

步骤：
1. 切碎水果和坚果。将它们浸泡在1杯葡萄酒中过夜，或者将坚果裹上面粉过夜。我将水果浸泡在葡萄酒中。
2. 制作蛋糕糊 - 将黄油和糖搅拌均匀。然后逐个加入鸡蛋，直到所有鸡蛋都加入。然后加入面粉。将搅拌好的面糊倒入装有坚果和水果的锅中，搅拌均匀。
3. 在烤盘上铺一层烘焙纸或蜡纸。只需铺在烤盘底部。用油涂抹纸张。
4. 在250华氏度（约120摄氏度）的烤箱中烘烤1.5至2小时。我的蛋糕需要烘烤4小时。在1.5小时后检查蛋糕，看看蛋糕是否呈浅棕色。蛋糕应烤至颜色较深。
5. 蛋糕烤好后，将其放在烤盘上的架子上冷却。在蛋糕冷却后，用刀子松开边缘。
6. 用葡萄酒浸泡纱布，然后放在蛋糕上。将蛋糕包好，存放在阴凉处。蛋糕应浸泡3或4次。

source: Title: Marble Cake, Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. butter 1/2 c. milk 1 1/2 c. flour 2 tsp. baking powder whites of 4 eggs, Steps: Cream butter and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Add the milk and mix well. Add flour and baking powder. Mix well. Beat egg whites until stiff and fold into mixture. Pour mixture into a greased and floured 9 x 9-inch pan, keeping a small portion of batter in mixing bowl. Drop 4 to 5 drops of red food coloring into remaining mixture. Mix well and drop by a spoonful at a time over the mixture in the pan. (This makes the marble effect.) Bake at 350° for 45 minutes or until done. If desired, frost with favorite frosting.

source: Title: Sponge Cake, Ingredients: 1 c. flour 2 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. almond 2 Tbsp. water 1 1/4 c. sugar 7 egg yolks 7 egg whites 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar, Steps: Sift flour once, measure and sift 4 times. Add water and 1/2 cup sugar, vanilla and almond to egg yolks and beat with mixer until very thick and light. Add flour all at once and stir until just blended. Beat egg whites and salt with mixer. source: Title: Tasty Lamb Kebabs, Ingredients: 3 lbs boneless leg of lamb, trimmed of fat and cut into 1-inch chunks 12 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice 1 tablespoon olive oil 3 cloves garlic, minced 12 teaspoon ground cumin 12 teaspoon ground oregano 14 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper 1 large red bell pepper, stemmed and seeded,and cut into 1-inch squares 1 large green bell pepper, stemmed and seeded,and cut into 1-inch squares 12 lb small fresh mushrooms, cleaned and stems removed, Steps: The night before, marinate lamb: In a large glass or plastic bowl, place lamb chunks. In a mixing bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, cumin, oregano, and pepper. Pour over lamb, seal tightly, and refrigerate overnight (if you must do this closer to dinner, marinate for at least a few hours). At dinner time, preheat grill or broiler. Drain marinade from lamb chunks and place meat on skewers, alternating with peppers and mushrooms (if using wooden skewers, soak in water for 30 minutes before using so they won't burn). Grill or broil 5 to 7 minutes on one side, then turn and cook for 5 minutes more; cook longer if desired. When meat is done to your liking, place skewers on a warmed platter and serve immediately.

source: Title: Beef Wellington, Ingredients: 250 g fillet beef steaks 6 shiitake mushrooms 4 shallots or 1 small red onion 4 garlic cloves 1 tablespoon prepared English mustard 4 slices cooked sliced ham 1 egg, beaten to a wash puff pastry, Steps: Either fry the fillet steak in very hot oil or butter (60 seconds each side) or sear the steak with a blowlamp until charred on all sides. Allow the steak to rest and cool. Finely chop the mushrooms, shallots and garlic and stir fry in hot olive oil for about 5 minutes. Keep aside. Lay two slices of cooked ham with a slight overlap on a sheet of cling film on a chopping board. Spread half of the duxelles over the slices in an even thickness. Place the fillet steak on the duxelles. Coat the steak with the mustard. Add the remainder of the duxelles to the top of the steak and then the remaining two slices of ham. Wrap the cling film around the steak and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Roll out the pastry and wrap the steak roll completely. Use egg yolk wash to seal the pastry and then coat the pastry completely. Fork over the top of the pastry. Preheat the oven to 180 degC. Place the Wellington on a baking tray and bake until brown, turning once. Allow to stand for 10 minutes then carve and serve with beef gravy if desired.

source: Title: Duck A L'Orange, Ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon olive oil 2 boned, skinned duck breast halves (about 8 oz. each) or 1 lb. boned, skinned chicken thighs 1 red onion (7 oz.), peeled, halved, and thinly sliced crosswise 1 cup orange juice 2/3 cup fat-skimmed chicken broth 1/4 cup orange marmalade 1 teaspoon lemon juice 1 teaspoon red wine vinegar 1 orange (8 oz.), rinsed, halved, and very thinly sliced crosswise (end pieces and seeds discarded) 1 cup couscous 1/4 cup medium-size green olives such as Picholine, pitted and coarsely chopped Salt and pepper, Steps: Pour olive oil into a 10- to 12-inch nonstick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add orange juice, broth, marmalade, lemon juice, vinegar, and orange slices; boil, stirring occasionally, until mixture has thickened and is reduced by half, about 15 minutes. Meanwhile, in a 1- to 2-quart pan over high heat, bring 1 1/4 cups water to a boil. Stir in couscous, cover, and remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes. Pull duck into 2-inch-long shreds, or cut into 2-inch pieces or 1/4-inch-thick slices. Add to orange sauce along with any accumulated juices and the olives; stir until mixture is hot. Add salt and pepper to taste. Gently fluff couscous with a fork. Spoon onto plates and top equally with duck and sauce.

source: Title: Madeleine, Ingredients: 2 Eggs 80 grams Granulated sugar 100 grams Cake flour 1/2 tsp Baking powder 100 grams Unsalted butter 1 half a lemon's worth Lemon zest (you can substitute this with lemon oil), Steps: Combine the flour and the baking powder, then sift. Zest the lemon and melt the butter in a microwave. Crack eggs into a bowl, add the sugar and beat well. Add the flour and the lemon zest and mix until well combined. Add the melted butter in 2-3 doses, and mix until it is well incorporated and the batter is glossy. Cover with plastic wrap and let it rest in the refrigerator for 1 hour~6 hours. You can leave the whisk in the bowl. Prepare the mold while you let the batter rest. Use a ball of plastic wrap and use it to spread shortening on the mold (no need for any flour! ). Or, use a ball of plastic wrap to spread some butter (just the amount left in the bowl that you used to melt it would be enough) on the mold, chill in the refrigerator, then sift some cake flour on it (dust off the excess flour). Mix the batter until it is smooth, then fill the mold by about 80% (I used two spoons). Pop large bubbles with skewers, etc. Bake at 180C for 20 minutes, then remove immediately from the mold and cool. Once they have cooled to room temperature, put them in a bag to keep them from drying out.

source: Title: Lemon Tart, Ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour 4 12 tablespoons sugar 5 tablespoons butter, softened (not melted) 1 egg 1 teaspoon vanilla 18 teaspoon salt 5 eggs 6 ounces sugar 3 lemons, juice of 1 orange, juice of 2 lemons, zest of (grated outer peel) 5 tablespoons butter, Steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. 1. Combine dry ingredients for crust in a bowl. Cream in softened butter. 2. Beat egg with vanilla and salt, and blend into batter. Form into shallow eight-inch straight-sided tart pan (a pie pan also works, but not as well). 3. Cover the tart dough with aluminum foil and fill with about a half-cut of dry red beans or pie weights. Place crust in preheated oven and bake with beans for 10 minutes. (This keeps sides from caving in, and the bottom from bubbling up.) Remove foil and beans and bake another five minutes. Cool crust. Reduce oven heat to 325 degrees. 4. Start the filling by beating the eggs. Blend in sugar slowly. Stir in juice, followed by lemon zest. 5. In a saucepan, melt the butter but don't let it get hot. Stir the butter into the egg-lemon mixture. 6. Pour the filling (it will be very liquid) into the tart shell, and put it in the center of the 325-degree oven. Bake 20 minutes. Allow to cool. references: Title: 柠檬蛋挞, Ingredients: 1 杯通用面粉 2汤匙通用面粉 4 12 汤匙糖 5汤匙黄油，软化（不融化） 1个鸡蛋 1茶匙香草 18茶匙盐 5个鸡蛋 6 盎司糖 3个柠檬，榨汁 1 个橙子，榨汁 2 个柠檬，切碎（磨碎的外皮） 5汤匙黄油, Steps: 烤箱预热到350度。 1. 将制作干皮的干原料混合在一个碗中。 软化黄油中的奶油。 2. 用香草和盐打鸡蛋，然后混合成面糊。 形成浅八英寸的直边馅饼盘（馅饼盘也可以，但效果不佳）。 3. 用铝箔盖住馅饼面团，然后加入大约一半的干红豆或馅饼馅。 将干皮放入预热的烤箱中，加入豆子烘烤 10 分钟。（这可以防止侧面塌陷，底部也不会冒泡涨起） 去掉箔纸和豆子，再烤五分钟。 放凉 将烤箱温度降低到 325 度。 4. 通过打鸡蛋开始填充。 慢慢加入糖。 加入果汁，然后加入柠檬皮。 5. 在平底锅中，融化黄油，但不要让它变热。 将黄油加入到鸡蛋-柠檬混合物中并搅拌 6. 将馅料（它会非常水）倒入蛋挞皮中，然后将其放入 325 度烤箱的中央。 烘烤 20 分钟。 让其冷却。 用新鲜覆盆子或草莓装饰。

source: Title: Pumpkin Scones, Ingredients: FOR THE SCONES: 1 cup Flour 2 Tablespoons Dark Brown Sugar 1/2 Tablespoons Baking Powder 2 teaspoons Pumpkin Pie Spice 1/4 teaspoons Salt 1/2 cups Canned Pumpkin Puree 2 Tablespoons Pumpkin Spiced Coffee Creamer 1/4 teaspoons Vanilla Extract FOR THE MAPLE GLAZE: 1/2 cups Powdered Sugar 3 Tablespoons Maple Syrup 1 pinch Pumpkin Pie Spice, Steps: Preheat the oven to 425°F and line a baking sheet with a silicone mat or parchment paper. In a large mixing bowl, whisk the flour, brown sugar, baking powder, pumpkin pie spice and salt together to aerate them. Gently stir in the pumpkin puree, coffee creamer and vanilla until a soft dough starts to form. Turn out the dough on to a clean, floured surface. Knead the dough for 4 to 5 turns to bring it together into a uniform ball. Gently flatten the ball and pat it out into thin circle. Use a knife to cut the circle into 8 equal wedges. Do this by quartering the circle and then cutting each quarter in half. Transfer the wedges to the lined baking sheet and bake the scones for 14-15 minutes. While the scones bake, prepare the simple glaze. Simply combine the powdered sugar, maple syrup and pumpkin pie spice in a shallow bowl and stir it all together until it becomes a smooth glaze. When the scones are done, take them out and let them cool on the sheet for a minute. Take each slightly cooled scone and dip the tops of them in the glaze to coat them. Transfer them to a rack to finish cooling. Make sure there is a sheet of aluminum foil underneath to catch the drippings. It makes clean up so much easier. Serve with some great tea or coffee for an amazing breakfast treat or afternoon snack!
references: Title: 南瓜饼, Ingredients: 烤饼： 1杯面粉 2 勺棕糖 1/2 勺泡打粉 2勺南瓜派香料 1/4勺盐 1/2 杯罐装南瓜泥 2 勺南瓜香料咖啡奶精 1/4 勺香草精 对于枫木釉： 1/2 杯糖粉 3 汤匙枫糖浆 1 撮南瓜派香料, Steps: 将烤箱预热至 425度，在烤盘上铺上硅胶垫或羊皮纸。 在一个大搅拌碗中，将面粉、红糖、泡打粉、南瓜派香料和盐搅拌在一起，使它们通气。轻轻搅拌南瓜泥、咖啡奶精和香草，直到形成柔软的面团。把面团放在干净的、撒了面粉的台面上。将面团揉 4 至 5 圈，使其揉成一个均匀的球。轻轻地压平球并将其拍成细圆圈。用刀将圆切成 8 个相等的楔形。通过将圆四分之一然后将每个四分之一切成两半。将楔子转移到有内衬的烤盘上，烤烤饼 14-15 分钟。 烤饼烘烤时，准备简单的釉料。简单地把糖粉、枫糖浆和南瓜派香料混合在一个浅碗里，搅拌在一起，直到变成光滑的釉状。烤饼烤好后，将它们取出，放在烤盘上冷却一分钟。取每个稍微冷却的烤饼，将它们的顶部浸入釉料中以覆盖它们。将它们转移到架子上以完成冷却。确保下面铺一张铝箔。它使清理变得容易得多。与一些美味的茶或咖啡一起享用美味的早餐或下午点心！

步骤：

5. 轻轻将球状面团压扁，拍成薄圆形。用刀将圆形切成8个等份，即先将圆形切成四份，然后将每份再切成两半。
6. 将切好的楔形面团放在铺好的烤盘上，烤14-15分钟。
7. 在烤司康饼的同时，准备简单的糖浆。在一个浅碗中，将糖粉、枫糖糖浆和南瓜馅料调料搅拌均匀，直至变成顺滑的糖浆。
8. 当司康饼烤好后，取出并在烤盘上稍微放凉。将每个稍凉的司康饼顶部蘸上糖浆，使其均匀覆盖。
9. 将司康饼放在架子上继续冷却。在架子下铺一层锡箔纸，以便接住滴落的糖浆，方便清洁。
10. 搭配一杯美味的茶或咖啡，作为早餐或下午茶点享用！
